title: Katie Price claims Keisha Buchanan 'got close' with Peter Andre after their split
text:

Katie Price is on fire today, having been slapped with her fourth driving ban in two years (and being told to stay off the roads for another two years), getting blasted by the judge for failing to turn up to court, and begging glossy magazines to whisk her off on lavish holidays in exchange for information about her love life.

And she hasn't stopped there, as the ex-glamour model has also dragged up her ex-husband Peter Andre once again, more than 10 years after their divorce.

Speaking this morning on Flex FM, Katie told her close mate Rick Live that Pete got cosy with a Sugababe after their high-profile break-up.

"I remember the black girl, what was her name? She got friendly with Pete after we split," Katie stated coolly, referring to original Sugababe Keisha Buchanan.

"Let's leave that there," said Rick hurriedly, as Katie made a retching noise on air.

Pete and Keisha were first linked in December 2010 when they were pictured together at various events - and she even turned up to his O2 gig with throat sweets in case he had trouble with his vocals.

But Pete denied there was any romance there, insisting at the time: "In truth, we're just good friends.

"We've got a lot in common in terms of our careers and she's given me such brilliant advice.

"She's great and I really like her but there's no romance," he added.

(Image: Phil Loftus/Capital Pictures)

Mirror Online has contacted Peter and Keisha's reps for comment.

During her radio appearance, Katie also slated her good friend Kerry Katona's voice, claiming she tells her all the time that she can't sing.

"I always take the mick out of Kerry and say, 'Kerry you can't even sing'. [Her daughter] has an amazing voice, her and Princess together," she said.

Katie then came up with the idea of teaming up with Kerry and Michelle Heaton and calling themselves Girls On Top.

"Why not me and Michelle, Kerry, you can go in the background," she laughed.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Getty Images)

"We can go on tour, yeah baby! We could be called Implants. Don't you think that would be fun?"

She went on: "I could be in front, cos I've got more front than them. Kerry, Michelle, if you're listening, why don't we form a band?"

Katie then turned her attention to Stormzy, saying he should pay a visit to her mucky mansion.

"I'm amazing in the kitchen. Stormzy can always come and cook for me and my mates. Come and bring a storm to my life, Stormzy," she purred on air.

Despite insisting she would no longer be giving away information about her private life for free, Katie couldn't resist dropping a nugget into the conversation as the radio show wrapped.

"Next year maybe a baby and a wedding," she laughed. "See ya!"
description: A decade after their divorce, Katie Price hinted her ex-husband Peter Andre got cosy with the singer
